SEARCH
Module com.example.myuno
Package com.example.myuno.model.gamelogic.game

Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
com.example.myuno.model.gamelogic.game.GameContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameContext extends Object implements Serializable
Maintains the current state of the UNO game.

This class stores the last card played, manages the players and their turns, and tracks game-related transitions such as the player with only one card.

See Also:

    • GameContext

      public GameContext(Card lastCard, GameContext.Turn turn, Player playerOne, Player playerTwo)
      Constructs a GameContext with the initial state of the game.
      Parameters:
      lastCard - the last card played on the table
      turn - the current player's turn
      playerOne - the first player
      playerTwo - the second player

      Retrieves the last card played in the game.
      Returns:
      the last card on the discard pile

      public Player getPlayerWithOneCard()

    • getTurn

      public GameContext.Turn getTurn()
      Returns the current turn indicator.
      Returns:
      the turn enum indicating which player's turn it is

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Switches the turn to the other player and triggers appropriate UI updates. Also updates the current and next player references accordingly.
